::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/Scyther/Demise/Darkmouse::

Killfest looks out to the horizon, seeing a speck as Scyther 
approaches. "They're coming," he says.

in several seconds, Scyther lands in front of Killfest. He was 
damaged and leaking mechfluid, and had paint on him.

"The others are on their way," Scyther says, altering his robot mode 
to get most of the damages on the inside, where his repair system 
began working on them. EndBringer crashes through several trees a bit 
later, damaged but insane. Killfest checks his scanners for the 
location of Demise. The bot was slowly moving underground.

"Demise is going back to base," Killfest says to DrillBit, "This 
should be enough. Let's go."

He sets off toward their destination, Greven, Scyther, and EndBringer 
following him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse recieves DrillBit's transmission.

"Sure thing, boss," she replies, running out of the base and toward 
DrillBit and group.
